children.name: metadata
children.description: Event metadata such as timestamp, source product, etc.

children.name: principal
children.description: Represents the source of activity in the event.

children.name: target
children.description: Represents a target entity being referenced by the event.

children.name: src
children.description: Represents a source entity being acted upon by the participant.

children.name: observer
children.description: Represents an observer entity which is not a direct intermediary.

children.name: intermediary
children.description: Represents details on one or more intermediate entities processing activity.

children.name: about
children.description: Represents entities referenced by the event that are not otherwise described.
